scripts.build: vite build && mkdir -p dist/static dist/.well-known && cp -r public/static/* dist/static/ && cp public/favicon-*.png public/apple-touch-icon.png public/android-chrome-*.png public/site.webmanifest public/openapi.json public/robots.txt public/sitemap.xml public/llmo.txt dist/ && cp public/.well-known/ai-plugin.json dist/.well-known/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name project-02ceb497
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name project-02ceb497
scripts.db:seed:all: npm run db:seed:videos && npm run db:seed:news
scripts.db:seed:prod: wrangler d1 execute webapp-production --remote --file=./seed_real_videos.sql && wrangler d1 execute webapp-production --remote --file=./seed_news_mock.sql
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed:all
scripts.backup:auto: npm run backup && git add backups/ && git commit -m 'chore: auto backup' || true
scripts.predeploy: npm run backup:auto && npm run build
